conversations.final_reply:
Great choice, Diwakar! A 25-year policy term is a good fit for many people.

Next, could you please share your preferred coverage amount? This will help us tailor the plan to meet your needs effectively. 

For example, if you're looking for Rs. 10 Lakhs in coverage, we can see how much that would cost per year based on your age and occupation as a software engineer.

llm_decision.reply: Sure! The coverage value is the amount of money that will be paid to your beneficiaries if something happens to you during the policy term. For example, if you choose a coverage value of Rs. 1 Crore and an unfortunate event occurs, your beneficiaries would receive Rs. 1 Crore. This helps ensure they have financial security even in difficult times.
llm_decision.reasoning: The user is seeking information about the coverage value, so we provide an explanation naturally without forcing data collection.
